title: A seasonable vindication of the B. Trinity being an answer to this question, why do you believe the doctrine of the Trinity? : collected from the works of the most Reverend, Dr. John Tillotson, late Lord Archbishop of Canterbury, and the right Reverend Dr. Edward Stillingfleet, now Lord Bishop of Worcester.
author: Tillotson, John, 1630-1694.
notes: Compiled by W. Assheton. Cf. BMC.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
